___name.description: The official grant number from the NIH database, if applicable
___name.title: Name

___viewing_group.description: The group that determines which set of data the user has permission to view.
___viewing_group.title: View access group

___component.description: The ENCODE component the award is associated with.
___component.title: ENCODE component

___start_date.comment: Date can be submitted as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___start_date.title: Start date

___end_date.comment: Date can be submitted as YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSTZD (TZD is the time zone designator; use Z to express time in UTC or for time expressed in local time add a time zone offset from UTC +HH:MM or -HH:MM).
___end_date.title: End date

___title.description: The grant name from the NIH database, if applicable.
___title.title: Title

___rfa.description: The name of the bioproject phase.
___rfa.title: RFA

___milestones.description: A set of grant milestone deliverables agreed upon by the awardee and NIH.
___milestones.title: Milestones

___contract_date.description: Date on which the milestone was agreed upon.
___contract_date.title: Contract date

___proposed_count.description: Count (in number of units) of the deliverable proposed.
___proposed_count.title: Proposed count

___assay_term_name.description: OBI (Ontology for Biomedical Investigations) ontology term for the assay.
___assay_term_name.title: Assay name
enum: CRISPR genome editing followed by RNA-seq
DNA methylation profiling by array assay
genotyping by high throughput sequencing assay
protein sequencing by tandem mass spectrometry assay
single cell isolation followed by RNA-seq

___deliverable_unit.description: Unit of the proposed milestone deliverable.
___deliverable_unit.title: Deliverable unit

___project.description: The collection of biological data related to a single initiative, originating from a consortium.
___project.title: Project
